title: Florida Matters: 2015 Legislative Session
teaser: By law, the only thing the Florida Legislature must do is pass a budget during the 60-day legislative session that is now under way. But lawmakers are working on many other issues, from how to spend money under Amendment One, to expanding the availability of marijuana for medical use and increasing employment opportunities for Floridians. This show features highlights of a statewide preview show hosted by Tom Hudson at WLRN in Miami.
